name: Elrine
description:
Content warning: themes of death.

A lone cosmonaut crash lands on an empty planet. But is it as lifeless as it seems? Led by psychic messages, he begins a journey through rock and nihilism towards the end of a great emptiness. Has he gone mad? Can a planet truly suffer? Can loneliness ever really end?

WASD controls, mouse (or touchpad) required.

Programming, art, and music by Tsutalya, dialogue and description by Rufus Wolff.
